_comment: This file lists required environment variables. DO NOT add actual secret values here.

required_env_vars.WALLET_KEYPAIR: Base58-encoded Solana wallet private key for signing transactions
required_env_vars.GITHUB_CONTAINER_REGISTRY_PAT: GitHub Personal Access Token with packages:write scope for pushing Docker images
required_env_vars.EMERGENCY_SWEEP_ADDRESS: Solana address to sweep funds to in emergency stop scenarios

optional_env_vars.JUPITER_API_KEY: Jupiter API key for premium endpoints
optional_env_vars.DRIFT_SUBACCOUNT: Drift subaccount ID if using multiple accounts
optional_env_vars.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL: Slack webhook for alerts and notifications

setup_instructions: 1. Copy this file to .env in the repository root
4. For CI/CD, add secrets to GitHub repository secrets
5. Never commit .env or any file containing secrets
